metadata.skill_description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and handling forms

core_actions.name: Read PDF
core_actions.description: Load a PDF file and access its pages and metadata

core_actions.name: Extract Text
core_actions.description: Extract text content from PDF pages

core_actions.name: Extract Tables
core_actions.description: Extract tabular data from PDF pages using pdfplumber

core_actions.name: Merge PDFs
core_actions.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document

core_actions.name: Split PDF
core_actions.description: Split a PDF into separate single-page documents

core_actions.name: Create PDF
core_actions.description: Create a new PDF document using reportlab

core_actions.name: Rotate Page
core_actions.description: Rotate PDF pages by specified degrees

core_actions.name: Add Watermark
core_actions.description: Overlay a watermark PDF onto document pages

core_actions.name: OCR Scanned PDF
core_actions.description: Perform OCR on scanned PDF images using pytesseract

rules.name: Validate File Exists
rules.fail_consequence: return error: file does not exist

rules.name: Check Table Not Empty
rules.condition_expression: table is not None and len(table) > 0

missions.name: Fill PDF Form
missions.description: Complete workflow to fill out a PDF form with provided data

missions.name: Extract All Tables to Excel
missions.description: Extract all tables from PDF and export to Excel
missions.stop_condition: Excel file created with all extracted tables
